art_collection.name: Sunset Serenity
art_collection.description: Capture the beauty of a tranquil sunset with this stunning canvas. Printed on 100% polyester base with acid-free print media, featuring a medium texture and scratch-resistant finish. The solid wood frame is fully finished with corner bumpers for level hanging and wall protection. Easily wipes clean with a damp cloth.

art_collection.name: Mystic Forest
art_collection.description: Step into a world of enchantment with this captivating forest scene. Crafted on high-quality polyester canvas with acid-free print media, offering a smooth texture and durable finish. The solid wood frame ensures stability and includes corner bumpers for secure hanging. Effortlessly maintain its beauty with a quick wipe-down using a damp cloth.

art_collection.name: Ocean Dreams
art_collection.description: Immerse yourself in the calming serenity of ocean waves with this breathtaking canvas. Printed on premium polyester canvas with fade-resistant inks, ensuring vibrant colors that last. The solid wood frame provides durability and elegance, complete with corner bumpers for easy hanging. Keep it looking pristine with a simple wipe-down using a damp cloth.
